name: Starflopper (Liminal Dynamics)
description:
Can you fly, flip, flop, and plop a flappy spaceship?

Keyboard Controls:

Tab
R
N Hide/Show UI
Reset Vehicle
Trigger Flight Termination System Q
E
W
A
S
D Roll Left
Roll Right
Pitch Down
Yaw Left
Pitch Up
Yaw Right Left Shift
Left Ctrl
Z
X
1, 2, 3 Increase Forward Target Velocity 
Decrease Forward Target Velocity 
Set Target Velocity to 0
Shut Down All Engines
Toggle Engine by Position T
F
C
G Switch Propellant Tanks
Increase Collective Flap Angle
Decrease Collective Flap Angle
Deploy Landing Legs ,
.
/ Decrease Time Scale
Increase Time Scale
Reset Time Scale to 1

This is a side project that will be further developed as time allows, feel free to leave feedback in the discussion board!
